website_summaries.verdict: A nicely designed percussion massager with performance that's comparable to some more expensive models.
pros: Includes interchangeable heads for versatility and convenience
Powerful performance with a range of intensity settings Features full-body massage capabilities
Extra long 16 foot cord offers extended reach
cons: Rare cases of heads self-detaching during use

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I was heartbroken when my 40 year old Oster hand held finally bit the dust, but I read a lot of reviews of massagers, and decided on the Liba. It is fantastic. I initially thought it was a bit heavy, but it is the exact correct weight to use the machine without having to exert any pressure. Long cord a real plus, I did not want a battery operated machine. Great product, seems very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: JSK/Florida

customer_reviews.title: What a Pleasant Surprise!!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I confess I thought this was just another massage gimmick, and how good can it be for that cheap price? Well, it turns out that it is great. The deep tissue massaging is great a really very helpful for my wife's aching back and sciatica. One problem is it literally stinks. It has a horrible smell like burning electrical wiring or circuit board, but it has been running for two months with no problems. It doesn't get hot, and my wife runs it for as long as 30 minutes. The stink is only slightly abated now.
customer_reviews.author: Michael F. Harrington, Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Strong and versatile: easy to use from head to toe!
customer_reviews.text: This massage tool is heavy enough that I don't have to exert lots of pressure, yet with its various settings, I can get a variety of feels--soft, a little firmer, strong, and very powerful. I like the two heads so that I do more than one place at a time. I do wish the space between the two heads were adjustable, as sometimes I wish I could move them closer together. But that's minor. Over all, when I use this tool, it does what I need, and I feel GOOD!
customer_reviews.author: B. Noia

customer_reviews.title: Pure Heaven!
customer_reviews.text: After back and knee I juries I was on a cane for months. My chiropractor used something similar that really helped, so I decided I needed to own one. Best purchase ever! Relieves pain and relaxes muscles like magic! Long handle allows easy reach anywhere on yourself. Light enough weight for easy use, long cord, nearly silent. Using it on my abused knees and muscles, and my neck snap cradle popped after first use! Great price and shipping was whiplash fast!
customer_reviews.author: Zarrin reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the nicest hand held massagers I've owned and I've owned several. The three major things I love are the on/off switch & adjustable massage switch, a super-long power cord and the massage action. If I had any complaint it would be a slight odor from the rubberized handle that transfers to my hands. I think it's getting less after using several times. Be careful with the rubber tips though, I had the one which the little fingers on and after an hour of steady use where I fell asleep, I woke to several small open sores on my skin! Personally I've never used different tips on a massager and won't ever again.
customer_reviews.author: Steve AKA:

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Just OK. I've used massagers for about 20 years. Here is the things I feel can be improved, 1. handle could be longer - I can't reach some parts of my back 2. attachments don't stay on - attachments pop off in the middle of using it 3. grip too thick - I have small hands and it is hard to keep a hold when reaching my back 4. cord not reinforced next to unit - that is where everyone of my messagers broke.
customer_reviews.author: red

customer_reviews.title: This massager does not play around. It lives up ...
customer_reviews.text: This massager does not play around. It lives up to it's description as a deep tissue massager. It's a bit heavier than I expected but I suppose it has to be heavier to accommodate the power. A massage with this beast on arms and legs and shoulders will leave you relaxed and feeling revived. This massager is not for sissies.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lasted 1 MONTH then died with recommended use
customer_reviews.text: Okay, this is my THIRD UNIT and by far the worst experience. I bought this massager on the 4th of March and here it is April 6th, one month and TWO DAYS after the return window closed and its shorting out and won’t stay on at all. Like flip the switch and it turns on for a quick second and then nothing. Now this has happened with previous units that I’ve purchased but after several months. My pattern of usage is not different and I pay attention to the time it’s been on. I’m not rough with it. It just didn’t last any therapeutic period of time for its cost. Sadly looks like my last one.. Geez
customer_reviews.author: Vonny

customer_reviews.title: Using Longer Than 15 Minutes Per Session Voids Warranty
customer_reviews.text: Great deep-tissue massager right out of the box. The warranty is void if you use it for more than 15 minutes at a time; we routinely use it for an hour or more. After 6 months of daily use, it still works but is very loud. I'd recommend a commercial grade massager for anyone in our situation--that's what we'll be replacing this with. Update: August 14, 2020. It's gotten gradually louder, but still works. Used 1-2 hrs at a time, nearly every day until last April when we purchased a rechargeable unit. Now it's our back-up massager used 1-2 times per week. It's holding up remarkably well considering it's not made for such heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: kh16

customer_reviews.title: Not a percussion massager...
customer_reviews.text: This is not a true “percussion” massager. It vibrates. It still feels nice, but I feel horribly misled. Percussion is like the beating of a drum. This massager is not percussion.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Wissinger

customer_reviews.title: POWERFUL! The ONLY strong one I've found!
customer_reviews.text: The ONLY percussion massager that comes close to the old school homedics, not even homedics could accomplish that I order 3 others before finding this life saver. It actually is a little stronger for sure bUT for my therapy it awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Obviously Human!

customer_reviews.title: Have To Return
customer_reviews.text: I just got it yesterday and unfortunately, it has to go back as I'm not sure it's worth the money. You have to be careful as I somehow pinched my back a few times but the real reason is the heaviness of this device. I didn't find it comfortable having to use it with one hand. It has a real good vibration which I liked but felt awkward to handle.
customer_reviews.author: Amz Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: No specifications
customer_reviews.text: The product manual and as well as its box do not list any specifications of the product (such as listed in the product page up to 5,000 percussion). I cannot trust the product with no specifications and characteristics. It is Made in China, but still I was expecting to find out more about the product after receiving it. Do not know whether it is safe to use this or not.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Not Percussion and it doesn't stay in one place!
customer_reviews.text: This is Not a Percussion massager the heads move very fast in a side to side motion. If you place it on your forearm it will slide to your wrist, if you place it on your thigh it will move to your knee. Think of this as a very fast Windshield Wiper rubbing back and forth on your skin. Warning the paperwork says "Do not massage any one site of the body for longer than 3 minutes" I held it in one place on my arm for about 30 seconds. I didn't feel very much but, I did get a red mark of my skin which lasted for about an hour!
customer_reviews.author: RedJack

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: Unlike the battery massagers, you get a real massage from a plug in model. This one has a huge cord, so no problem with the typical short cords! And it's adjustable power means you can go light, or really fire it up! This one feels like the one my chiropractor uses at his office, it's wonderful! Treat yourself today!
customer_reviews.author: Marko Pollo

customer_reviews.title: works pretty well
customer_reviews.text: I like the massager. It's a bit heavy to hold after a while but it helps with sore muscles. The extra long cord is absolutely great! I will warn, however, that there is a pinch point between the massage head and the plastic body of the massager. If you get a fold of skin in there, it's going to hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Paul D.

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple muscle and joint problems and this massager is a miracle worker. I have used other brands in the past 15 years and none of them give me the relief that this unit does. Their customer service is fantastic, any question i have had they have responded immediately and have gone above and beyond. This review may sound over the top but when you have chronic pain anything that gives me relief I am gonna sing their praises. This is a fantastic product and a fantastic company.
customer_reviews.author: Rennie

customer_reviews.title: Big and powerful..
customer_reviews.text: It's big and powerful. Handle is about a foot long and head is about the size of a large soup bowl. Definitely will give a deep massage, and does feel like it vibrates at higher speeds. With skinny people like me it feels weird if you let it bounce on top of your shoulder blades, doesn't hurt though. Extra long cord!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Update. if your skin gets in between the two massaging things it pinches Feels good If not pinching
customer_reviews.text: Update on my review. It pinches terribly if you are not careful.Update on my review. It pinches terribly if you are not careful that you don’t get it too close to another piece of your body at the same time Well made. Feels great when it is not pinching. Easy to use by yourself I don’t use the attachments
customer_reviews.author: Michele Overton

customer_reviews.title: Professional quality
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this purchase. First, the packaging and printed inserts were the most professional and useful I can ever remember seeing. A 3-year warranty is a nice plus along with the 16-foot cord and powerful motor. The dimmer-button is perfect for neuromuscular pain, and its ergonomic design makes it easy to reach to the mid-back. Will buy again from this company. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: ileensixstring

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Well made and sturdy but light weight. I used it immediately after receiving and was amazed how well it worked on my back. The percussion is adjustable and the strongest setting is pretty aggressive. Just what my back needed. My back was so bad that I could barely walk or get up from a seated or prone position. After 15 minutes with this massager I could get up and walk upright. Amazing gadget!
customer_reviews.author: L S Y

customer_reviews.title: The massager works better than expected
customer_reviews.text: The massager works better than expected. I use it to massage my husband's lungs to keep them from filling with fluid and then collapsing. His pulmonologist approved buying and using it and we are getting the results we want.
customer_reviews.author: Delta Girl

customer_reviews.title: Use for Back and Neck pain, but stopped working, need refund
customer_reviews.text: I loved this, it worked very well for approx 1 2 month. It was never too loud and it did release/interrupt my pain while using. However - It is no longer working and will be returning as I purchased the ASURION 3 Year Personal Care Protection Plan $20-29.99 Delivered Aug 9, 2019 -
customer_reviews.author: kloudiee

customer_reviews.title: Godsend
customer_reviews.text: This massager is amazing. I got it as a gift for my boyfriend but I am now considering getting one for myself too. We took turns using it. It really can get into the deep tissue. It is shaped nice for using by yourself too. I found it easy to use it on my back and shoulders. I would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cathrine mcneil

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a Licensed Massage therapist specializing in medical massage and deep tissue. She says this is a good device and could put her out of work! She uses it on my IT band in a way that I can't myself and it has worked wonders. I read some of the negative reviews, and we just haven't had any of those issues. If I were to have purchased this product for more money than what I spent, I would not be any less satisfied. The customer service was also good, so I give this a perfect review!
customer_reviews.author: Joel Rhome

customer_reviews.title: It suits my needs very well!
customer_reviews.text: The cord is plenty long enough for my needs. It is a little heavy, but the shorter handle makes it manageable, if, as someone else has pointed out, you let it glide over your body and don't lift it up to move it. I had one of these type massagers in another brand with an already long handle which telescoped even longer. It was too hard to manage as you had to hold it just right which was tiring. This one is not so! I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great massager for back and shoulder muscles. I also use it on my hands before playing guitar. I would recommend to anyone needing a electric massager...
customer_reviews.author: Skrp

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: As this is the only product of its kind I have bought, can't compare it to other products. But found it works great as a percussion massager. For me the power is perfect and the long cord is wonderful. Not too heavy either. Got it for my back and the long handle is perfect. For the price you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Belmont

customer_reviews.title: Powerful percussion massage
customer_reviews.text: I have chronic muscle spasms due to bad spine and sit all day long. Own three different percussion massagers and this one is the most powerful one. Bought 2 more for family members once they tried mine. Hands done this is the best percussion massager I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Razzy

customer_reviews.title: Game Changer
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from chronic lower back pain and sciatic pain and have spent so much money on doctors and medication. This has literally improved my quality life 100%! I used it every day at first but now only use as needed. The price was great and the quality and craftsmanship of this product is way up there with Drs office equipment. If you are in pain, buy this...Its worth every penny!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sara R

customer_reviews.title: Worked great...while it worked
customer_reviews.text: In terms of performance, I have no complaints about this great device. It works wonderfully to knock out the kinks and providing vibration to get the blood flowing properly. Unfortunately, it lasted a little over a year before it died out due to a short in the wire. For the price, its worth it, but know that you may have to purchase one annually if you use it fairly often.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Purchaser

customer_reviews.title: Great price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: Great price and quality! I just tried it today after a hard day at work and it got out all my kinks in a matter of minutes. It's lightweight and I had no problem using it on my own back. It looks like it's built to last and packaging says it has a 3yr warranty. I will update my review if I have any problems over time.
customer_reviews.author: Sasha Evans

customer_reviews.title: Best Percussion Massager for Sore Back Muscles
customer_reviews.text: Excellent pounding for sore muscles after any overextension or injury. Best if you can get a partner to apply the device to your back, it needs a foldable extended handle designed to reach your own back.
customer_reviews.author: JayisMad

customer_reviews.title: Works great.  Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Good Strong massager! Sturdy and really gets down in. Some complained about the cord but it is not that big of a deal. Move it out of the way. It is long enough you can!. Best buy I've made in years!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I got this for my husband, and he's had ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband, and he's had no complaints so far. He's been using similar ones for years, but they've worn out quickly. We'll see how long this one lasts, but for the moment, it's doing its job.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Fisk

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste time! If you're looking for a great massager ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste time! If you're looking for a great massager just buy this one - it's great!
customer_reviews.author: Bob T.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Great! Powerful and seems very well-built. Ugly overall, but it gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Apple Worm

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing!! For the low cost of this massager, it's really great. It has a good selection between low and high settings, and multiple different head options that feel pretty great. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel J.

customer_reviews.title: Effective and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Well built. Easy to position anywhere. It is a bit heavy for a small person to use but I didn't have any problem
customer_reviews.author: frank

customer_reviews.title: NICE go to massager!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works as srated in the description. Still wish it had a lot more power to it. The extra long extension cord is amazing. The size is perfect. I'd try their other products. If they come with a harder pounding massager I'd love to try it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: jason

customer_reviews.title: A really nice back massage!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife for her back since she loves massages. My hands don't so I bought this hopping it would do a good job. Turns out? It's really nice and she was satisfied. It's really huge but I guess since it gets the job done I have no complaints. Then I put the thing on full throttle and stuck it on my crotch...WOW.
customer_reviews.author: StarsandSecrets

customer_reviews.title: Will the cord eventually stop suppling power to the massager at it's connection with the design of this massager? We'll see.
customer_reviews.text: Very good for deep muscle massage, but I have concern about whether the cord connection will affect the operation of the massager. I've purchased at least 4 other non-LiBa massagers that failed to operate because of the design of the cord to the connection of the massager.
customer_reviews.author: Cgraywolf

customer_reviews.title: Aching muscles
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this massager for me and my friends it seems to work great for relieving all the tension and aching muscles. I probably have bought six or more of these massagers to give to my friends
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Missing attachments and arrived used
customer_reviews.text: It arrived missing attachments and looks used. Cord is very long as described and seems to work. However it is used and missing all 3 attachments. Shipping box arrived undamaged but the product box shoes signs it's been opened.
customer_reviews.author: Steve chase

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Very helpful for disolving knots and tension, and I've even used it to help cure a sore throat by massaging my lymph nodes. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Elan Durham

customer_reviews.title: Great for reducing muscle inflammation and getting rid of muscle knows
customer_reviews.text: For some reason, for the past few months, my legs and back are full of sore, knotty muscles. I've tried chiro and massage and they've helped somewhat. This arrived last night. I used it for an hour, yes, an hour, while reading on my kindle. It worked! Many of the muscle knots are gone and the inflammation is vastly reduced. I'm very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Stellagirl

customer_reviews.title: did like
customer_reviews.text: a nozzle broke off. did not return as didn't rememsber how long i had it... in months.
customer_reviews.author: Beste

customer_reviews.title: Received used item
customer_reviews.text: Received a used item. It had some sort of dried liquid on it. And the handle was greasy. Whoever it was didn't even bother turning it off before pulling the wire out of the power socket.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Even though it is not wireless like alot of other massagers
customer_reviews.text: This massager does every as advertised. The value that you are getting at this price is umatched. Even though it is not wireless like alot of other massagers, the advantage is you do not have to worry about charging it and makes it a more reliable device. You never have to replace a batter. The massaging power has good linear variances.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Used to have a much more expensive one, this is just as good. Is great for my back and neck pain and increases circulation in my legs.
customer_reviews.author: LMR

customer_reviews.title: ... the past I must say this is an absolutely amazing product. The attachments are easy to use and ...
customer_reviews.text: Having used several hand held massagers in the past I must say this is an absolutely amazing product. The attachments are easy to use and definitely hold up to their promise. Each one delivers a different experience.. The massager packs a powerful punch. All in all a great product. Highly recommended !!
customer_reviews.author: SK

customer_reviews.title: Good enough
customer_reviews.text: It truly feels good. The vibrations give very good massages that penetrate deeply into the body. It made me feel better. I used it almost everywhere--face, back, tummy, chest, legs, feet, arms. On bony areas, I used a blanket or something cushiony with it because it can be quite hard on the surface. I'm unsure how long the motor will last; I've only had it for a couple of weeks. Yet, the 36 month warranty is useful.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: This came quickly and is an amazing price and it does work well
customer_reviews.text: This came quickly and is an amazing price and it does work well. I gave it 4 stars only because the only complaint that I about the product itself is the weight and that you really cant "dig in" if your using it on your own. It does feel really good, amazing even, if, someone is doing it for you. All that being said it doesn't really seem to relive any tension or pain, but I truly think that is just because of the condition my back is in, which if your wondering is horrible, weekly physical therapy daily muscle relaxers max inflammatory meds..
customer_reviews.author: Stevi Jo Malinowski

customer_reviews.title: Ahhhhhhhh
customer_reviews.text: Great price for an amazing massager. I wish I had purchased one sooner. It has a long cord so it is easy to use. It is a little heavy but I find that makes it easier and more effective to use. I totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: HLL

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working at exactly 2 years!
customer_reviews.text: Used maybe 20 times. Did like this massager, but now there is a short in the cord and it won’t work. Waste of good money!
customer_reviews.author: B Sam

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome and a good deal for your money. Some of these reviews almost scared me away. It is a great bargain. You get a fantastic product. I've had mine for almost a month now.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: Best money I ever spent
customer_reviews.text: Best money I've ever spent. I ha e been able to control my chronic leg and neck pain. This is lifesaver. I've saved tons by not having to visit the chiropractor for pain since I got it. I am so happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome, love it! Really strong motor, quiet operation and has alternate tips. No problems and it’s used everyday.
customer_reviews.author: ryan knodel

customer_reviews.title: Poorly put together
customer_reviews.text: I got a month use out of it before the handle broke where the cord comes in. Could not be repaired so ended up in my garbage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Very much worth the money! My husband and I will use it on each other, but it's also easy enough to use on yourself as well. The highest setting is pretty powerful, which I like, but the lowest setting is also nice. This product is very much worth the money and I would recommend it to a friend or family member that is looking for this type of massager.
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: 2 prong deep tissue massager
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing. I use it on my massage clients and they love it. I would give it 5*, but it didn’t come with instructions and I have no idea how to change the attachments.
customer_reviews.author: S. Bond

customer_reviews.title: Cellulite reduction
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. My clients love it for cellulite reduction its a deep tissue massage but, also breaks up the toxins and fluids under the skin to help reduce the appearance of cellulite. I'll recommend this item to anyone who is looking to enhance their overall beauty appearance.
customer_reviews.author: Ursula A.

customer_reviews.title: BROKE WITHIN THE FIRST USE
customer_reviews.text: When I received this I thought it appeared solid and would be great for my massage practice. I worked for the first few minutes and then stopped vibrating, motor continued to run. I couldn't send it back because it was past the return period. JUNK
customer_reviews.author: rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Buy this one!
customer_reviews.text: Great product has one like it before and this was is just as amazing. Great product great price and was here in a couple days!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really like mine. The cord is long do I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like mine. The cord is long do I didn't have to worry about sitting up against an outlet. The only thing I didn't like is that the handle is too short.
customer_reviews.author: Dogmama

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, I wasn't expecting this good of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product, I wasn't expecting this good of a machine when I bought it, since it was only $35. This massager is capable of getting deep into the muscle tissue and helping alleviate the pain. I'm one very happy customer, would recommend for anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Adams

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with my purchase. I had purchased many percussion massagers before to have the cords break in no time at all. This percussion massager is more powerful and the cord is longer and seems to be connected in a much better manner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Heavy - yes... bulky - yes... BUT it works! You can't get serious results from some little massager. This gets the job done!
customer_reviews.author: Darcel

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This works fabulously - I keep it by my couch...
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, and the attachments give a great massage for my sciatica
customer_reviews.author: Marianna

customer_reviews.title: Pain reliever
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product and relieves my neck/shoulder pain.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Mac

customer_reviews.title: Its mediocre
customer_reviews.text: This was bought in the hopes of relieving shoulder stiffness. The motions are rather rigid and the parts that you use are hard, being a small person, its been hard to adjust to the level of power it provides.
customer_reviews.author: Mehret

customer_reviews.title: Wow, now this is a great massager!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, what a massager. Beautiful device that gets deep into my muscle pains. Look forward to using everyday when I'm home. Great price for a even better device. No regrets on this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Javier Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: It's not as powerful as the HoMedics that I had ...
customer_reviews.text: It's not as powerful as the HoMedics that I had before. It has a very potent smell that comes from the handle which is large for my small hand. But, it is working and does provide relief..
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Only thing wrong with it is the handle is too thick. Hard to grip. But it's a wonderful messages for price
customer_reviews.author: Kristina G.

customer_reviews.title: I tried it out and it does a great job!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for another one that I've had for years. I tried it out and it does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: Gloria J. Seeders

customer_reviews.title: Simple and Effective Pain Relief
customer_reviews.text: Simple and effective, but a little heavy. Requires my wife to hold with both hands.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Tyree

customer_reviews.title: Great product and fast delivery.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my husband, who drives a truck for a living. He absolutely loves the way his back feels after use. This is powerful massager and worth the money. It arrived quickly in mint condition. I definitely would order from LiBa again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: didn't hold up
customer_reviews.text: powerful, but very quiet. Great for back problems and tightness any were. only lasted 4 months not tough enough
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Get rid of the pain.
customer_reviews.text: It really messages the areas that need it, and it’s lightweight, which makes it easy to handle.
customer_reviews.author: old school

customer_reviews.title: Almost
customer_reviews.text: Pro: I love how long the cord is! Great adjustable speed. It is mostly quiet. Sound is tolerable. Nice that it came with attachments. Con: It's heavy. The attachments tend to fall off. Percussion did the job somewhat but I still prefer shiatsu.
customer_reviews.author: AL L

customer_reviews.title: NOT disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I ended buying 3 different massagers before I came across this one and it did not disappoint! I LOVE my massager and so does the rest of the fam........; )
customer_reviews.author: Kandice Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Works great...good value.
customer_reviews.text: Works great,especially considering the reasonable price.I had an Obusforme massager but they cost around $100.00 and the last one I had burned out in less than two years.Also,this one is so much quieter.
customer_reviews.author: June Moley

customer_reviews.title: Great back relief.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect strength massager. Only wish it had a heat function. Easy to control. A little heavy to use on yourself.
customer_reviews.author: Carlene

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing helps my husband and I we will recommend it to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Holloway Torres Tribe

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Look no further - this is an absolutely awesome handheld massager that I cannot recommend highly enough!!!! So, so thankful that I found this massager. Has helped me tremendously!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janet Lucas

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: The massager is FANTASTIC. Far better that the ones that just vibrate. My order was easy to execute, I recieved it so fast! The whole experience was fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sashapup

customer_reviews.title: A very relaxing message.
customer_reviews.text: Item is a bit heavy, but size is quality, it's built to last. It gives a very good message easy to use, has a long power cord so can move around a bit with it. All in all a very good product.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Viles

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The product is great. The speed and vibrations really helped my achy back from hours in the car. I gave 4 stars because my the first massager was broken...however; customer service was beyond accommodating and I had a new one at my doorstep in 2 days. I'd highly reccomend for those aches and pains!
customer_reviews.author: Fini

customer_reviews.title: Great product can’t believe the value for the price
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe this is so good. For the price I don’t know how you can give it less than 5 stars. My wife’s back really feels better after using it and it saves my fingers from all the work.
customer_reviews.author: Braden Hancock

customer_reviews.title: Bad cord
customer_reviews.text: The power of the massager isn't bad. We have had it for just over a month and it is shorting out. I would like to find a massager that has a better cord. Have the same issues with different manufacturers. Dont believe I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Nhannes

customer_reviews.title: are great. But the cups dont stay on
customer_reviews.text: Everything about the unit , settings ,levels of intensity, are great. But the cups dont stay on.
customer_reviews.author: John Gibson

customer_reviews.title: Best massager for any price
customer_reviews.text: Great product and outstanding warranty service. Have extras to be sure this is there to save me.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Wealthentaste

customer_reviews.title: but speeds are great and powerful
customer_reviews.text: professional strength. Kinda heavy to hold, but speeds are great and powerful.
customer_reviews.author: Cat R.

customer_reviews.title: Light weight.
customer_reviews.text: Hi; I put to much pressure on mine and it broke. It is all right for light duty but not for heavy use. Ol'tom.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Owen

customer_reviews.title: it works great on my husbands knotted back and
customer_reviews.text: very powerful settings. it works great on my husbands knotted back and shoulders
customer_reviews.author: apriljadesilk

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but powerful
customer_reviews.text: This is very easy to hold but powerful enough to massage my husband's tight muscles. It is also very quiet for a large massager.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It is fairly light weight.
customer_reviews.text: I had a similar product for years and it was very heavy duty and gave a very deep massage. This one is ok, but not nearly as nice as my old one, which finally bit the dust.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly A. Steward

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this massager. It works great and seems to have a strong motor. The speed levels are great for using it in specific areas.
customer_reviews.author: Marcy Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Able to apply hard pressure without it bogging
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Able to apply hard pressure without it bogging down
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

product_meta.title: Percussion Handheld Deep Tissue Electric Massager Ð Three Heads, Adjustable Speed Settings & Powerful Motor Ð for Shoulder, Neck, Back & Body Pain Relief, Stress & Muscle Knots Release (Grey)
feature_bullets: ATTAIN MUSCLE PAIN RELIEF: This handheld electric massager enables you to target all troubled areas, by helping you massage them thoroughly and topically, one by one. It is the perfect at-home massaging tool, affording much needed soothing, whenever you might feel like needing it the most.

GET PROFESSIONAL GRADE, THERAPEUTIC TENSION RELEASE: No need to spend your hard earned money on spa massage services. This handy percussion massager allows you to perform the process yourself, just by turning it on! Sit back, relax and enjoy a powerful, therapeutic massage that will leave you feeling refreshed and rejuvenated.

POWERFUL MASSAGER MOTOR: Rapid massaging movements, performed in short, even intervals, are essential for effective massaging. Producing up to a whopping 5000 pulses per minutes, this massager features a high-performing, reliable motor, giving you an unparalleled massaged experience.

3 MASSAGE HEADS & ADJUSTABLE SPEED: Featuring a dimmer-like sliding switch, this handheld massager allows speed customization, according to your individual needs and comfort level. With 3 massage head attachments, LiBa’s electric massager is a full- fledged professional massaging tool, helping you reach all body areas with ease and massage them efficiently and with less effort.

WE GUARANTEE YOUR SATISFACTION: Each of our electric massagers is backed by a 36- Month Warranty. In the unlikely event our product does not meet or exceed your expectations, you can return it to us within the first 90 days and receive a full refund. Click Add To Cart Now And Get The Best Percussion Electric Massager On The Market!
